title: craftTweaker 迷之问题求助！！！
txt_content:
本人刚刚开始学写脚本，先写了个把鸡蛋一组最大设为64，结果。。。。
Script:
print ("Initializing Script");

<minecraft:egg>.maxStackSize = 64;


print ("Initialized Script");



Report:
[INITIALIZATION][SERVER][INFO] CraftTweaker: Building registry
[INITIALIZATION][SERVER][INFO] CraftTweaker: Successfully built item registry
[INITIALIZATION][SERVER][INFO] Loading scripts
[INITIALIZATION][SERVER][INFO] [crafttweaker | SIDE_SERVER]: Loading Script: {[0:crafttweaker]: MaxStackEdit.zs}
[INITIALIZATION][SERVER][INFO] Initializing Script
[INITIALIZATION][SERVER][INFO] Setting max stack size of  Egg to 64
[INITIALIZATION][SERVER][INFO] Initialized Script
[INITIALIZATION][SERVER][INFO] Completed script loading in: 347ms



感觉没错啊，但游戏里的时候还是一组16（服务端，script也在服务端，mod两边都有）
